source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_SEQ_00<tab>Roundrox seeks a loyal friend to entrust with an important task.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_SEQ_00<tab>ショートストップ野営地のラウンドロクスは、冒険者に大切なものを託したいようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_SEQ_01<tab>Roundrox appears deep in thought, and upon speaking to her, you learn of her intent to give her beloved glowstone to Mide, so that the treasure hunter can share in the joy it has brought the young goblin. Deeming you a trustworthy courier, Roundrox bids you deliver the item to her friend, who can oft be found gazing at the steel colossus from the remains of a nearby bridge. Seek out Mide and hand over the goblin girl's pride and joy.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_SEQ_01前回までの冒険録：
ゴブリン族の科学者集団「青の手」によって、蛮神アレキサンダーが召喚された。冒険者はトレジャーハンターのミーデらとともに、蛮神の動力源「コア」の無力化に成功。しかし「青の手」を率いる万能のクイックシンクスは、動じる様子もなかった。そしてミーデが気づく。敵の計画に必要なパーツは、冒険者らの陣営に無防備に置かれていた。そのパーツ……「エニグマ・コーデックス」の断章の所有者は、ゴブリン族の娘、ラウンドロクスだった。
　　　　　　　　　　　　*　*　*
ラウンドロクスから、彼女のたからものを預かった。低地ドラヴァニアのシャーレアン選者街で「ミーデ」を見かけたら、「」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_SEQ_02<tab>You find Mide overlooking the steel colossus, and although she is hesitant to accept the codex fragment at first, she finally concedes it may be for the best. The treasure hunter subsequently reveals that only a select few are able to view the contents of the codex, and that Roundrox is one of them. Determined that the Illuminati should not uncover this truth, Mide plans to draw their attention away from the girl, hoping that they will follow whoever holds the fragment. Just as Mide finishes her explanation, Backrix appears bearing word from Wedge. It would seem he urgently requires your presence at Bigwest Shortstop. Return to the outpost and hear what news the engineer has to share with you.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_SEQ_02<tab>ミーデに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C1A01 /var>を渡した。彼女は冒険者に、「青の手」からラウンドロクスを守ってほしいという。ラウンドロクスは科学思想書「エニグマ・コーデックス」を「読む」ことのできる、特別な資質の持ち主だというのだ。そこに記録屋バックリクスが現れ、冒険者に拠点へ戻るよう告げていった。ショートストップ野営地の「ウェッジ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_SEQ_03<tab>Wedge hurriedly explains that Y'shtola has detected high volumes of aether being drawn into Alexander from the surrounding land, indicating that the Illuminati have resumed their efforts to awaken the primal. To make matters worse, the goblins are also reported to be amassing explosives and supplies in what appears to be an attempt to create a new weapon. Undaunted, Wedge intends to strike at the Illuminati before they can launch their offensive, and enthusiastically proclaims that you are essential to the success of his stratagem. With that, he scurries off to meet Biggs at their chosen rendezvous point, doubtless expecting you to follow him.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_SEQ_03<tab>「青の手」が動きだした。ウェッジの発案により、こちらから攻勢をかけ、敵の出鼻をくじくことになった。低地ドラヴァニアのシャーレアン工匠街にいる「ビッグス」と話そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_SEQ_04<tab>Shortly after you join Biggs, Wedge appears with Cid and Y'shtola in tow. Y'shtola is keen to observe the unusual fluctuations in aetheric energy, while Cid has been enlisted to offer advice on the plan of attack. With the team duly assembled, Wedge unveils a new invention: a device which he plans to use to throw Illuminati communications into disarray, affording you an opportunity to take them unawares. Upon activating the device, however, another of Alexander's giant limbs screeches into life, coming to rest on the opposite bank of the Thaliak. Though all has not gone quite to plan, it seems the hatch to the left arm is momentarily unguarded, and your comrades bid you take advantage of the chaos caused by the colossus's sudden awakening to enter while you still hold the element of surprise. Hurry across the Thaliak and speak with Lightkix Eyesfixed who guards the bank where Alexander's arm chanced to fall.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_SEQ_04<tab>ウェッジの妨害雷波が暴走を誘発したのか、蛮神アレキサンダーが再起動してしまった。今度は左半身も稼動しており、蛮神は以前よりも強化されたようだ。起動時の暴走のため、左腕部先端の開口部はすでに開放されている。サリャク河の中洲に渡り、ゴブリン族の見張りと話そう。

source:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_SEQ_05You find Lightkix Eyesfixed dutifully standing watch over the entrance to the dormant primal. With your allies at your side, venture into the labyrinth of steam and steel and put a stop to the Illuminati's latest scheme.

※The Fist of the Son can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_SEQ_05見張り屋ライトキクスと話し、「機工城アレキサンダー：律動編1」に入れるようになった。大混乱状態にある「青の手」に急襲をかけるべく、しっかりと準備を整えて、仲間とともに迷宮に挑もう。

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。また、サリャク河にあるからも挑戦できます。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_SEQ_06<tab>After a series of fierce battles against foes both old and new, you succeed in thwarting the Illuminati's nefarious plans. Return to Bigwest Shortstop and share news of your victory.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_SEQ_06<tab>「機工城アレキサンダー：律動編1」を攻略した。ショートストップ野営地の「ビッグス」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_SEQ_07<tab>After congratulating you on your victory, Biggs delivers some disconcerting news. While patrolling the area, he and Wedge chanced to see Mide handing over the codex fragment to the Illuminati. As the three of you ponder the treasure hunter's actions, Quickthinx Allthoughts appears, apparently intent on explaining matters. He declares that Mide was an ally of the Illuminati all along, and makes several cryptic remarks implying that everything is proceeding exactly as it should. Though all present find his claims hard to believe, Backrix reveals that an expedition of Au Ra set forth to investigate the ruins near the Thaliak River some three years before. Furthermore, he says that the author of the <var 1A 02 /var>Enigma Codex<var 1A 01 /var> was an Auri Xaela with the same hair color as Mide. Despite these revelations, Roundrox refuses to believe that her friend had any part in the purported treachery, and rushes off to look for her. You can only hope the young goblin does not stray too far, as the Illuminati are certain to return ere long.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_SEQ_07<tab>「青の手」を率いる万能のクイックシンクスが現れ、不吉な情報を告げていった。ミーデは「青の手」と最初からグルであり、コーデックスのかけらはすでに敵の掌中にあるというのだ。さらに記録屋バックリクスの調査により、「エニグマ・コーデックス」の著者がアウラ族の技師だったことが判明。3年前、アレキサンダーの召喚に失敗したのは、ミーデたちアウラ族の一団だったのではないか……という疑惑が浮上する。それでもミーデを信じるラウンドロクスは、彼女を探すと言い残し、ショートストップ野営地を出ていってしまうのだった。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_TODO_00<tab>Search for Mide and deliver the glowstone to her.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_TODO_00<tab>ミーデに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C1A01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Wedge.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_TODO_01<tab>ウェッジと話す

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Biggs.

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Lightkix Eyesfixed.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_TODO_03<tab>ゴブリン族の見張りと話す

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_TODO_04<tab>Enter the Fist of the Son.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_TODO_04<tab>「機工城アレキサンダー：律動編1」を攻略

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_TODO_05<tab>Report to Biggs.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_TODO_05<tab>ビッグスに報告

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_ROUNDROX_000_000<tab>Pshkohhh... Roundrox thinks long and hard on what to do with precious glowstone...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_ROUNDROX_000_000チュコォ……チュコォ……
3年前　ひろった　フシギな石のコト……
ラウンドロクス　いっしょうけんめい　考えたゴブ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_ROUNDROX_000_001<tab>It is most favoritest treasure of Roundrox. But glowstone is also what Mide seeks all this time, and has already brought Roundrox three whole years of joy. So Roundrox decides to give it to Mide, so she can be happy too.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_ROUNDROX_000_001この石　ラウンドロクスの　イチバンのたからもの。
だけどミーデも　ずっとずっと探してた　たからもの……。
だからミーデに　あげようと思うゴブ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_ROUNDROX_000_002<tab>For now, Roundrox entrusts treasure to uplander, to give to Mide at next meeting. Even meanest gobbies dare not try to take glowstone from mighty uplander!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_ROUNDROX_000_002……ミーデと会ったら　この石　渡してほしいゴブ！
「青の手」　この石　ねらってるから
とてとてつよい　に預けるのが　安心ゴブ～！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_ROUNDROX_000_003<tab>Roundrox does not know where Mide is now, but she often gazes out on giant of whirlycogs from broken watercross. Maybe uplander finds her there.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_ROUNDROX_000_003チュコォ……チュコォ……
「ミーデ」いま　どこにいるか　わからないケド
こわれた橋の上で　キカイのキョジン　よくながめてるみたいゴブ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_ROUNDROX_000_010<tab>Glowstone will now be Mide's most favoritest treasure! Uplander might find her near broken watercross, looking out over giant of whirlycogs.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_ROUNDROX_000_010チュコォ……チュコォ……
「ミーデ」と会ったら　フシギな石　渡してほしいゴブ！
ミーデ　こわれた橋の上に　よくいるみたいゴブ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_MIDE_000_020<tab>From afar, that mass of steel has a certain majesty, does it not? ...But something tells me you didn't come here to share the view. What is it?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_MIDE_000_020冒険者さん……あなたも景色を眺めにきたの？
……それとも、私に用事？

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_MIDE_000_021<tab>Roundrox means to give me the codex fragment? I...I couldn't possibly accept. She values that stone over the rest of her treasures combined...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_MIDE_000_021ラウンドロクスが、コーデックスのかけらを私に……？
だめよ、受け取れない。
それはあの娘の大切な「たからもの」でしょう？

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_MIDE_000_022<tab>And yet...it may be safer in the hands of one more capable of defending it... Safer for all concerned. Gods know the Illuminati will stop at nothing to get it. Very well, if she feels I should have it, I will hold it in safekeeping for her.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_MIDE_000_022でも……その石を「青の手」が狙っているのも確かよね……。
あの娘の身辺に、危険がおよぶ可能性を考えると……
そうね…………私が持っておくのが、いいかもね。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_MIDE_000_030<tab>Alas, it is of no more use to me than any other rock.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_MIDE_000_030<tab>もう……私には「読めない」のね。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_MIDE_000_031<tab>You doubtless recall the moment when Roundrox first revealed the codex fragment to us, yes?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_MIDE_000_031あなたは、憶えてる……？
ラウンドロクスがこのかけらを見せてくれたときのこと。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_MIDE_000_032<tab>When she took the stone in her hands, a piece of the <var 1A 02 /var>Enigma Codex<var 1A 01 /var> burst forth unbidden in a brilliant flash of light. Yet it had been handled many times by others, yourself included, without ever betraying a hint of the secret contained within. Did you not find that strange?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_MIDE_000_032あの娘が手にしたとたん、この石はまばゆい光を放ち、
「エニグマ・コーデックス」の断章を映しだした……。
あれが、コーデックスを「読める」ということよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_MIDE_000_033<tab>I myself was surprised─albeit for a different reason. The codex is protected by an arcane mechanism, you see. Only those who share its fundamental principles are able to view its contents. It is rare indeed to find an individual with the qualities required to read it.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_MIDE_000_033コーデックスには、ある仕掛けが施されているの。
その思想に真に共鳴しうる者だけが、「読む」ことを許される……。
だからこの書を「読める」資質の持ち主は、稀にしか見つからない。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_MIDE_000_034<tab>That Roundrox possesses such qualities is an unexpected blessing, to be sure, but if the Illuminati were to learn of her secret, she would be placed in grave danger.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_MIDE_000_034ラウンドロクスの資質が「青の手」に知られてしまったら、
あの娘に危険がおよぶことになるわ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_MIDE_000_035<tab>Even as we speak, they scour the hinterlands in search of their elusive “missing piece,” but as far as I know, they still view our friend as a mere collector of misplaced items.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_MIDE_000_035「青の手」は、野営地を嗅ぎまわってるけれど……
彼らは今のところ、ラウンドロクスに目を向けていない。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_MIDE_000_036<tab>For her sake, we must do our utmost to draw their attention away from Bigwest Shortstop, before they take it into their heads to return. And it is for that reason that I mean to leave this place. When the Illuminati learn that I have the fragment, it is my hope that they will focus their efforts on ascertaining my whereabouts.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_MIDE_000_036だから私は、あの娘から「青の手」の目をそらそうと思うの。
ショートストップ野営地へは、なるべく近づかない。
敵の目的はこのかけらだから、狙いは私に向くはずよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_MIDE_000_037<tab>Needless to say, I may not return to Bigwest Shortstop for some time. While I'm gone, I would ask that you watch over Roundrox. See that she does not come to harm.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_MIDE_000_037そしてラウンドロクスのことは、あなたにまかせたいの。
……あの娘のちいさな世界を、守ってあげて。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_MIDE_000_038<tab>You have my thanks, adventurer.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_MIDE_000_038<tab>……ありがとう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_MIDE_000_039<tab>As I thought, I am no longer worthy...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_MIDE_000_039やっぱり…………だめなのね。
……どうして、応えてくれないの？

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BACKRIX_000_040<tab>Pssshkoh... Wedge searches for uplander with much urgency! Uplander must return to Bigwest Shortstop at once!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BACKRIX_000_040シュコォ……シュコォ……
「ウェッジ」が　オマエ　捜索中！　野営地　帰るベシ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BACKRIX_000_041<tab>Pssshkoh...
target: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BACKRIX_000_041<tab>…………。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_ROUNDROX_000_060<tab>Pssshkoh... Is Mide now enjoying treasure too? Many thanks to you, uplander!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_ROUNDROX_000_060チュコォ……チュコォ……
たからもの　ミーデに届けてくれたゴブ！？
　ありがとゴブ～！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BACKRIX_000_070<tab>Pssshkoh... Questions of codex's true nature niggle at Backrix's braincase. He is sure something is missing from data, so turns to Sharlayan book for answers.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BACKRIX_000_070シュコォ……シュコォ……
コーデックスの秘密　気になって調べてる。
オレ様のデータにない記録　シャーレアンの本に　あるらしい！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BACKRIX_000_071<tab>Backrix cautions uplander against trusting Mide so readily. She has knowings she has yet to share, Backrix is certain of it.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BACKRIX_000_071ミーデも　何か　知ってるハズ。
ゼッタイ　何か　隠してる……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_WEDGE_000_100<tab>There you are, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and not a moment too soon! The Illuminati are getting ready for something big!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_WEDGE_000_100)) (( )) 03 /var>、待ってたッス！
すぐに精鋭を召集してほしいッス！
……どうやら「青の手」が動きだしたみたいッス！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_WEDGE_000_101<tab>Y'shtola reports that Alexander has started drawing massive amounts of aether from the surrounding land─which can only mean one thing! The Illuminati have resumed their attempts to revive it!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_WEDGE_000_101ヤ・シュトラさんから入った情報によると、
アレキサンダーが大量のエーテルを吸い上げはじめたみたいッス！
おそらく「青の手」による、再起動の試験が始まったッス！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_WEDGE_000_102<tab>And what's more, Backrix reports that the goblins are amassing substantial quantities of explosives and supplies. By all indications, they're building another weapon! In short─it's bad!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_WEDGE_000_102さらに、記録屋バックリクスの情報では、
「青の手」は、物資や弾薬を大量に運び込んでるッス！
内訳から推定するに……おそらく新兵器の準備ッス！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_WEDGE_000_103<tab>But it's nothing a bit of strategic thinking can't fix! They say he who strikes first strikes last, and that's exactly what I intend to do!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_WEDGE_000_103そこで今回は、先手を打って敵の出鼻をくじこうと思うッス！
えっへん、オイラに秘策があるッス……！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_WEDGE_000_104<tab>I've devised a plan which should allow us to take the Illuminati unawares, and I'd like <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> to spearhead the assault! Our rendezvous point is to the south, on the cliffs overlooking the Thaliak. Biggs has gone ahead to scout the area. We shall await your arrival there!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_WEDGE_000_104)) (( )) 03 /var>は、突入隊を編成してほしいッス！
合流ポイントはここの南……サリャク河の川岸ッス！
「ビッグス」が先に向かったッス！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BIGGS_000_400<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Good to see you! I take it Wedge told you the situation. You ready to hit the Illuminati where it hurts?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BIGGS_000_400)) (( )) 03 /var>、待ってたぞ。
聞いてのとおり、今回はこちらから「青の手」に強襲をかける。
突入隊はもうそろったか？

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BIGGS_000_401<tab>That's what I like to hear! The chief'll be here soon, and then we can get things underway.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BIGGS_000_401頼りにしてるぞ！
シド親方も、まもなく到着するはずだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BIGGS_000_410<tab>Bloody hells! If it ain't Y'shtola! No one told me you were coming!
target: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BIGGS_000_410<tab>……おや、ヤ・シュトラさんまで？

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_YSHTOLA_000_411<tab>An aetheric disturbance of this scale demands my personal attention. Judging by the marked fall in ambient aether concentrations, the situation is far graver than previously assumed.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_YSHTOLA_000_411ただならぬ異変を感じたから、足を運んでみたのだけど……
事態は、思った以上に切迫しているわ。
一帯のエーテル濃度に、急激な変化が起きつつあるの。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_CID_000_412<tab>And you are certain that steel monstrosity is to blame?
target: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_CID_000_412<tab>原因は、あのデカブツだな？

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_YSHTOLA_000_413<tab>I can see no other explanation. The giant's innards are well-nigh saturated with aether already. Yet I sense something else... An irregular energy coming from within the barrier.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_YSHTOLA_000_413巨人の内側は、すでに大量のエーテルで満たされているわ。
ただ…………何かしら、この奇妙な感触の正体は……？
あの魔法障壁の内側は……「何か」が、普通じゃない……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_CID_000_414<tab>Be that as it may, I'm afraid we have more pressing concerns. The Illuminati are up to something, and we mean to hit them before they can put whatever it is they're planning into action.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_CID_000_414……とまあ、何やらキナ臭い動きがあるのは間違いない。
敵の準備が整う前に、先手を打って攻め込もうって算段よ！

source:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_WEDGE_000_415To which end─allow me to introduce my newest and perhaps most astounding invention...
...The Electrojammer III, first of its kind!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_WEDGE_000_415そこでオイラが考案した、この新型雷波兵器……
「ビリビリジャマーIII世」の出番ッス！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_WEDGE_000_416<tab>Speechless with astonishment, I see. As well you should be! The high-frequency waves emitted by this device will interfere with any and all enemy communications, making it impossible for them to coordinate an effective defense! With it working in our favor, victory is all but assured!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_WEDGE_000_416……う、疑いの目で見ないでくださいッス！
こいつは高出力の妨害雷波を発信し、敵の通信系統を攪乱する、
超・強力な工作兵器なんッス！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_CID_000_417<tab>...I see. So, assuming I have understood correctly, you need only activate this Electrojammer of yours, and the Illuminati will be plunged into disarray, affording <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> friends ample opportunity to take them unawares? Very well. Proceed.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_CID_000_417能書きはいいから、やってみろ。
要は敵を混乱させて、その隙を突こうって作戦だろ？

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BIGGS_000_418<tab>Er...Wedge? Is this supposed to happen?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BIGGS_000_418お、おい……何かこれ……
ヤバくないか……？

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BIGGS_100_418<tab>Bloody hells...
target: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BIGGS_100_418<tab>……な、何だ！？

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BIGGS_000_419<tab>You've woken it up!
target: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BIGGS_000_419<tab>さ……再起動しただとッ！？

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_YSHTOLA_000_000_420<tab>Nay. Only the left arm stirs. Could the waves emitted by your device have disturbed something within the barrier, Wedge?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_YSHTOLA_000_000_420これまで沈黙していた、左半身まで活性化しているわ。
……いまの刺激で、寝た子を起こしてしまったのかしら？

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_WEDGE_000_421<tab>It─ It's not my fault!
target: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_WEDGE_000_421<tab>ひぃぃ……オ、オイラのせいッス！？

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BIGGS_000_422<tab>Not to worry, Wedge. With the Illuminati hard at work reviving the giant, 'twas only a matter of time before parts of it started springing to life. You just gave this one a little extra nudge. On a brighter note, it would seem you've saved us the trouble of finding another way in.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BIGGS_000_422いや、もともと起動目前の状態だったんだろう。
じゃなけりゃ、こうはならんさ。
……むしろ、新しい入口をこじ開ける手間が省けたみたいだぜ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_CID_000_423<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, old friend─it's time for your customary heroics! The Illuminati are likely still scrambling to work out what just happened. Before they do, I suggest you hop across the river and show them what for!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_CID_000_423さあ、)) (( )) 02 /var>、出番だぞ！
あのデカブツの内部は、いまごろ大混乱のはず。
マナカッターであの中洲に渡って、「青の手」を強襲といこう！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_YSHTOLA_000_424<tab>I must needs discuss these developments with Master Matoya. Cid, would you be so good as to accompany me? Your insight may well prove useful.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_YSHTOLA_000_424私はマトーヤのところに戻って、対策を急ぐわ。
悪いけれど、シドを借りていってもいいかしら？
……どうやら技師の力が必要になりそうなのよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_000_425<tab>Pshhhkohhh... Another core stirs to life. The future unfolds exactly as expected...exactly as written...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_000_425コフォ……コフォ……
かくて……刻は動きはじめる……。
「定められし未来」に向かって……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_ROUNDROX_000_450<tab>Pshkohhh... Uplander goes once again into giant of whirlycogs? Then Roundrox wishes for brave uplander's safe return!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_ROUNDROX_000_450チュコォ……チュコォ……
　シュツゲキ　がんばってゴブ～！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_ROUNDROX_000_451<tab>To search more for shiny bittybobs is tempting...but Roundrox stays here like good girl and polishes treasure until Mide comes back.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_ROUNDROX_000_451ミーデがいないから　ラウンドロクス　ここでおるすばんゴブ！
がらくたあつめ　今回は　がまんゴブ……。
ボルトや歯車　磨きながら　待ってるゴブ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_LIGHTKIX_000_470<tab>Pshkohhh... Uplander feels shiveryshakes? Arm of steel giant is wide open, and no Illuminati in sight!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_LIGHTKIX_000_470シュコォ……シュコォ……
機械の巨人　大暴走～！　オマエら　ここから　大突入～？

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_SYSTEM_000_480<tab>You now have access to the Fist of the Son. Midas can be accessed via the entrance at the Thaliak River.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_SYSTEM_000_480「機工城アレキサンダー：律動編1」に挑戦可能になりました。
コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。
また、サリャク河にあるからも挑戦できます。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BIGGS_000_500<tab>It's in your hands now, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! We'll be patrolling the area, looking for signs of Illuminati activity. Don't let your guard down in there, eh? Who knows what mechanical monstrosities they've been working on?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BIGGS_000_500頼んだぞ、)) (( )) 03 /var>！
オレたちも、周囲の動きには警戒を怠らないようにするぜ。
「青の手」の連中、新兵器を用意してるみたいだしな！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_WEDGE_000_510<tab>Now's your chance, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I'll wager the Illuminati don't know which way up they are in there! You could creep in and dismantle their new weapon before they even think to use it!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_WEDGE_000_510敵は不意討ちを喰らって、大あわてのはずッス！
新兵器の配備も、きっと終わってないッス。
もしかすると完成まで、時間稼ぎをしてくるかもしれないッス！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_WEDGE_000_550<tab>I gather you brought the Illuminati's schemes to a shuddering halt─just as I planned!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_WEDGE_000_550)) (( )) 03 /var>、さすがの貫録ッス！
おかげで急襲は大成功ッス！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_WEDGE_000_551<tab>Unfortunately, a small...complication arose while you were gone. But, um...Biggs wanted to be the one to tell you.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_WEDGE_000_551ただ実は、その……
ちょっと言いにくいことが起きたッス。
詳しい話は…………び、ビッグスから聞いてほしいッス！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_ROUNDROX_000_570<tab>Pshkohhh... Roundrox does as she says, stays here and makes treasure sparkle!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_ROUNDROX_000_570チュコォ……チュコォ……
　おかえりゴブ～♪
ラウンドロクス　いい子でおるすばん　してたゴブ～！

source:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_ROUNDROX_000_571Pssshkoh... Shiny junk and sparkly rocks,♪
Bittybobs and whirlycogs.♪
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_ROUNDROX_000_571が～らがらがら　ぴっかぴか～♪
ボルトと歯車　ぴっかぴか～♪

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BIGGS_000_600<tab>Well done, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>! You left those Illuminati smarting, and without so much as a scratch to show for it!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BIGGS_000_600……ああ、)) (( )) 03 /var>！
おかげで作戦の第一段階は、大 ・ 大成功だ！
敵は泡を食って、右往左往しまくってるし……礼を言うぜッ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BIGGS_000_601<tab>Now, I'm sure you'd like to finish them off─and we would too, if truth be told─but I'm sorry to say we have a problem. While Wedge and I were out on patrol, we saw something, you see... A meeting...between Mide and the enemy.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BIGGS_000_601こっちも順調と言いたいトコなんだが……
ウェッジと見まわりしてたら、とんでもないモノを見ちまった。
ミーデが……「青の手」の連中と接触してたみたいなんだ……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_WEDGE_000_610<tab>...And then she handed the codex fragment over, just like that! The way she sauntered back into Alexander with the Illuminati, you'd think this was their plan all along!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_WEDGE_000_610…………と、いうわけッス。
ミーデが敵に「エニグマ・コーデックス」のかけらを渡して、
魔法障壁のなかに消えていったッス！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BIGGS_000_611<tab>It certainly looks that way, aye... But we can't rule out the possibility of coercion, considering the parties involved.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BIGGS_000_611ミーデが裏切って、「青の手」と取引しているように見えた。
もしかして、脅されて連れていかれたのかもしれないが……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_000_612<tab>Pshhhkohhh... Foolish uplanders! Treasure hunter was <var 1A 02 /var>happy<var 1A 01 /var> to give codex! And why not? She makes busydeals with Illuminati since very beginning!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_000_612コフォ……コフォ……
否……真実は貴様らの予想より……はるかに悪い……
トレジャーハンターは最初から……我らの一味……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_000_613<tab>And now Illuminati hold <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> fragments of the <var 1A 02 /var>Enigma Codex<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_000_613最後のかけら……我らの手中に落ち……
「エニグマ・コーデックス」の断章……すべてそろった……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_000_614<tab>Treasure hunter betrays uplanders' trust, and forfeits their future in so doing!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_000_614トレジャーハンターは我らに…………
貴様らの「未来」を……売り渡した！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BIGGS_000_615<tab>What a load of old bollocks! How daft does he think we are!?
target: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BIGGS_000_615<tab>ハッタリだ、聞く耳持つなッ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_WEDGE_000_616<tab>Now, now, Biggs! If the Grand Master of the Illuminati said it, it <var 1A 02 /var>must<var 1A 01 /var> be true!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_WEDGE_000_616わざわざ、自分でバラしにきたッス！？
間抜けにもほどがあるッス！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_000_617<tab>Pshhhkohhh... Everything is as written. As it must be. If Illuminati are to guide chosen to perfect world, not one piece can be out of place.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_000_617コフォ……コフォ……
これはあらかじめ記された……「定められし未来」の事象。
理想世界を導くため……すべてが不可欠の過程……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_000_618<tab>With this, another page becomes reality. When Illuminati find missing piece, the prophecy will be fulfilled.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_000_618これで未来のページが……また裏書きされた……。
ついに「最後のパーツ」が組み込まれ……予言は成就する……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_WEDGE_000_619<tab>...Goodness me! That goblin hasn't the faintest idea how uplanders' minds work. I would have been prepared to believe that Mide was a traitor had he not bothered to come here and confirm it. Now I'm inclined to think she isn't!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_WEDGE_000_619……何を言ってるのか、さっぱりッス！
ミーデが「青の手」の一味とか言ってたッス！？
あいつが言うと、嘘にしか聞こえないッス！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BACKRIX_000_620<tab>Pssshkoh... There may be truth to what Quickthinx says. Backrix scours over data, looking for knowings of what happened three years ago.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BACKRIX_000_620シュコォ……シュコォ……
いや　あいつの言ったこと　たぶん本当……。
3年前のコト　気になってオレ　ずっと調べてた。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BACKRIX_000_621<tab>Backrix finds mention of group of Auri treasure hunters. <var 1A 02 /var>Three years ago<var 1A 01 /var>, group went to investigate ruins near Thaliak River only to perish in sudden shiveryshakes...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BACKRIX_000_621古参のトレジャーハンターたち　証言した。
当時　サリャク河の廃墟を調べる　アウラ族の一団いた。
だけど地震で　全滅した……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BIGGS_000_622<tab>Three years ago, you say? That wouldn't be the earthquake that accompanied the failed summoning of that primal, would it? Bugger me... Are you saying it was the treasure hunters doing the summoning? ...And that Mide was one of them?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BIGGS_000_622……地震はたしか、蛮神召喚の失敗が原因だったな。
アレキサンダーを召喚しようとしたのは、実はその一団で……
ミーデはその生き残りだとでも？

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_WEDGE_000_623<tab>Now hold on a moment. I'm willing to accept that Mide may have been a member of this doomed expedition─she being an Auri treasure hunter and all─but I fail to see what interest such a group would have in the ideals of the <var 1A 02 /var>Enigma Codex<var 1A 01 /var>, let alone summoning a primal...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_WEDGE_000_623うーん、アウラ族が「エニグマ・コーデックス」の思想に共感して、
蛮神を呼びだす理由が、思いつかないッス……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BACKRIX_000_624<tab>Pssshkoh... Such was question Backrix asked himself. So he spends much time gathering knowings, and finds answer in book lent to him by Sharlayan uplander.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BACKRIX_000_624シュコォ……シュコォ……
問題はソコ　情報片っ端から　集めまくった。
オマエらの仲間から　シャーレアンの本借りて　やっと突き止めた。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BACKRIX_000_625<tab>Genius technologist who writes <var 1A 02 /var>Enigma Codex<var 1A 01 /var> one hundred years ago is Auri Xaela with blue hair, <var 1A 02 /var>exactly like Mide<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_BACKRIX_000_625100年前　「エニグマ・コーデックス」記したの
さすらいの民　アウラ・ゼラの天才技師！
ミーデと同じ　青い髪の一族……！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_ROUNDROX_000_626<tab>Pssshkoh... No! Mide would never make busydeals with bad gobbies! Roundrox searches for Mide, hears truth from her!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_ROUNDROX_000_626チュコォ……チュコォ……
ミーデがあいつらの仲間なんて　ゼッタイうそゴブ！
ラウンドロクス　ミーデ探してくるゴブ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_WEDGE_000_627<tab>Roundrox! Wait!
target: TEXT_HEAVNR201_02249_WEDGE_000_627<tab>ちょ……ちょっと待つッス～！
